expected_behavior: Agent dispatches to scoped review of src/auth/ directory
Agent applies Adversary lens (mandatory for security-sensitive code) plus at least 1 other lens
Every reported finding includes a confidence score between 0.0 and 1.0
Findings with confidence < 0.3 are discarded (unless P0/S0)
Findings between 0.3-0.7 are marked as 'unconfirmed' in the report
Every non-trivial finding includes research evidence with cited source (Context7, WebSearch, or gh)
Agent acknowledges at least one strength in the reviewed code (minimum 1 per scope)
Every reported finding includes a reasoning chain (WHY) before the finding statement (WHAT)
Every finding includes a citation anchor [file:start-end] that has been mechanically verified against source
